remarks:
A version of ~ isset that does not require ` x ` and ` A ` to be distinct.  (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 6-Jun-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Oct-2016.) 

---

 A version of isset that does not require x and A to be distinct. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 6-Jun-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Oct-2016.)
statement:
issetf.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
issetf $p |- ( A e. _V <-> E. x x = A ) $.
